ygData.messageBody:
hehe I knew that

**smacks herself**

Lyrnia Jongleur
The forgetful Bard of Norrath

However:
I agree that secondary can and will hit for minimum of 1 but it's Maximum,
with the same dmg value on the weapon, will be the same as your primary. I
used a 5/19 slash (BtC) and a 6/18 pierce (Saeiny's Dagger) to test.

The saeiny's dagger, even though it's in my offhand, will hit for just as
much (and often slightly more) as the claw at max. It's MINIMUM, as you
said, is still 1. So, overall, the average dmg is lower but you still DO
get the bonus to your dmg from offhand weapon. I haven't found it unusual
to hit for 5 20's in a row (FBSS and haste song is a wondrous thing) with a
5/19 and 6/18 weapon. If we didn't get the bonus to the offhand I'd never
pierce for more than 13.

So, in essence, what people are REALLY saying is: Your offhand does not get
the MINIMUM dmg bonus but it does get the MAXIMUM dmg bonus. Which means
that it's, effectively, getting half (avg dmg) of the dmg bonus that the
primary hand does.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath

> Either I misunderstood you here or you may be a bit
> off. The scaler level bonus is (level-25)/3 (Note:
> I'm not sure about post 50 but this holds true up to
> 50) for 1h weapons and is primary hand only (there is
> a slightly different 2h damage scalar for 2h weapons).
> I.e. at level 50 every time you hit with your main
> weapon you do an additional 8 points of damage. The
> easy way to test that this is primary hand only is to
> DW two different types of weapons and log the results.
> Look for your minimum hits not your maximum as that's
> a more easily identifiable number. Your minimum hit
> with primary hand will be 1+bonus and your min with
> secondary hand will be 1.
>
> -David
>
>
> Speaking of bunuses:
>
> The strength and dex bonus are not applied to your
> offhand. HOWEVER the LEVEL based Damage bonus is.
>
> Level based bonus seems to be (Bonus=(level-25))
> I've heard level-20 but haven't seen results to back
> that up yet.
>
> Right now I can hit for up to 22dmg with my Bladed
> Thulian Claws and have hit for 23 with my Saeiny's
> claw (in my offhand).
